Description.Name: Vincent Hauser
Description.Details: Vincent Hauser, known by the callsign "Hulk", is a resolute and iron-willed MechWarrior whose journey from pirate to mercenary is fueled by a desire to make things better. "Hulk" embodies a force of nature on the battlefield. channeling his tumultuous past into an overwhelming onslaught against any foe that crosses his path. Vincent Hauser, often carves a path of devastation that leaves no doubt in the victory, and usually little chance for salvage.
